comments:
After unzipping to a program files directory:

c:\archivos de programa\eclipse

I run the eclipse.exe.  I get a screen saying that it is completing the 
installation and then a splash screen.  No log file is generated.  There's disk 
activity for first few seconds and splash screen stays visible for about 10 
minutes and finally disappears.

Can you start 
java -cp startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main instead of the executable

(messsage means 'one of the devices connected to the system is not working')

The DLL referred to is definitely in the file system (which is a normal FAT 
filesystem)

A .log file is still not being generated.
Does it ring a SWT bell ?

Try copying the DLL into the java\jre\bin.  Windows 95 is totally unsupported 
and untested so we can't help that much.  We don't even have one to try.
I'm closing this as WONTFIX because we have nothing to do with Window 95.
Thanks for trying.  I figured it was probably a Win95 issue :-(
